title: Here is a shorte resytal or certayne holy doctours whych proueth that the naturall body of christ is not conteyned in the Sacrame[n]t of the Lordes supper but fyguratyuely, collected in myter by Ihon Mardeley
author: Mardeley, John.
publisher: In Sainct Andrevves in the VVaredrop, by Thomas Raynalde,
notes: Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
